message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know if you're interested, as I have other potential buyers lined up.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  $1,300,000 is my lowest possible price, considering the value of this product. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,250,000. This is my final offer.
